Hi There

I have a linkbutton that when I press it, RTE appears. In the background I got a hdn value of 1 and 0 depending on if its shown or not.. pretty standard stuff.

However when its "hidden" and reappears I cannot press on any of the buttons nor edit. It's like the control has been disabled. It in a td without anything special.

I have tried the official release and latest build without any success. Any hints would be great.

Thanks, Shawn

I have heard of others having trouble with UpdatePanels and RTE. So if you are trying a partial post back, try it with a full post back instead.

Also, make sure there aren't any JavaScript errors occurring.
